backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control, allowing users to read and update their own profile and legacy high-score operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented frontend features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including UI, game systems, and state management.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, theme, authentication, and switching between Garage and Race views.
frontend/src/auth/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/auth/ProfileSetupModal.tsx: Modal for first‑time players to create an initial user profile before entering the game.
frontend/src/game/controls/useKeyboardDr: Hook mapping keyboard input to steering, braking, and boosting states.
frontend/src/game/controls/useTiltSteeri: Hook providing optional mobile tilt‑based steering via device orientation events.
frontend/src/game/garage/carLibrary.ts: Defines the CarVariant interface and a list of predefined car variants with colors and base speeds.
frontend/src/game/garage/GarageView.tsx: Renders the 3D garage view with car preview, car selection controls, and a start button.
Zustand store managing the selected car index with persistence and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/game/persistence/useHighSco: Hook managing high score storage, syncing with backend when authenticated and using localStorage otherwise.
frontend/src/game/RaceView.tsx: Race screen rendering the 3D scene, HUD, and overlays with Escape‑key pause handling.
frontend/src/game/scene/CameraRig.tsx: Camera component that follows a target with shaking effects during boost or drift.
frontend/src/game/scene/CarModel.tsx: 3D car model component using basic geometries, supporting accent colors and optional headlights.
frontend/src/game/scene/effects/BoostTra: Displays animated glowing boost trails behind the car during boosting.
frontend/src/game/scene/effects/RainEffe: Particle-based rain system that updates droplet positions relative to the player.
frontend/src/game/scene/Environment.tsx: Sets up the sky, road, and side barriers using textures and basic meshes.
frontend/src/game/scene/LightingRig.tsx: Dynamic lighting system adjusting sun position and ambient light based on time of day.
Renders coin and nitro pickup objects with simple meshes and lights.
frontend/src/game/scene/RaceScene.tsx: Main race scene wiring physics, AI, environment, effects, and rendering player and rival cars.
frontend/src/game/sim/constants.ts: Defines physics, nitro, day-night, and scoring constants used throughout the simulation.
frontend/src/game/sim/dayNight.ts: Hook simulating day-night cycle over time and determining when it is night.
frontend/src/game/sim/progress.ts: Utility determining whether the player is in first or second place based on Z positions.
frontend/src/game/sim/scoring.ts: Zustand scoring store and hook that triggers race finish when reaching the finish distance.
frontend/src/game/sim/useCarPhysics.ts: Updates car position, steering, drifting, and grip each frame based on inputs, weather, and nitro boost.
frontend/src/game/sim/useNitro.ts: Manages nitro boost state with depletion, regeneration, and a Zustand store.
frontend/src/game/sim/usePickups.ts: Generates coins and nitro pickups and marks them collected when the player gets close.
frontend/src/game/sim/useRaceTimer.ts: Tracks race time in a Zustand store and increments it each frame.
frontend/src/game/sim/useRivalAI.ts: Moves a rival car forward with slight lateral oscillation.
frontend/src/game/sim/useSpeedometer.ts: Converts car speed to km/h for display.
frontend/src/game/sim/weather.ts: Randomly toggles raining state on a timer.
frontend/src/game/state/gameState.ts: Zustand store for game view and race state transitions.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsHelp.tsx: UI button and popup showing control instructions.
frontend/src/game/ui/FinishOverlay.tsx: Displays race results, handles high scores, and provides restart/garage actions.
frontend/src/game/ui/HUD.tsx: Renders in-race HUD including score, time, speed, nitro, and position.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseOverlay.tsx: Pause screen with resume, restart, and garage options.
frontend/src/game/ui/StartOverlay.tsx: Start screen prompting the player to begin the race.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login/clear actions, and status flags using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and update the caller's user profile via an actor, with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for themes, including light/dark color tokens and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers to read, store, persist, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme tokens, colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, features, issues, and required assets for a Unity-based arcade racing game prototype.
